nodes.text: The HyperMatter Storage Facility was a storage facility in the Black Hole, a hypermatter refinery on the planet Corellia. During the Galactic War, forces of the reconstituted Sith Empire raided the facility to replenish their own reserves.

The HyperMatter Storage Facility is the site of the Imperial mission "Hypermatter Directive," which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 1.1 along with the rest of the Black Hole.
